mapper.insert: insert into t_website (id, webid, connection_url, name, tag_key, tag_value, selective) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{webid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{connectionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selective,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, webid, connection_url, name, tag_key, tag_value, selective from t_website
